result.arabic_text: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ
result.translation: He has made the sun and the moon for your service, both constant in their courses, and has made for you the night and the day[23].
result.footnotes: [23] i.e., the day in which people go about their living and the night during which they get rest.
